meanings.definition: A Greek island in the northeastern Aegean Sea.
meanings.sent1: I dream of visiting Lesbos one day.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of Lesbos is renowned for its stunning landscapes.
meanings.sent3: When I close my eyes, I imagine a magical journey to Lesbos.
meanings.sent4: Her paintings transport you to a place as enchanting as Lesbos.
meanings.sent5: The allure of Lesbos beckons travelers from far and wide.

meanings.definition: A native or inhabitant of Lesbos.
meanings.sent1: The Lesbos people are known for their warm hospitality.
meanings.sent2: She proudly identifies as a Lesbos native.
meanings.sent3: At the festival, everyone celebrated the spirit of being a true Lesbos.
meanings.sent4: His love for his homeland is as deep-rooted as any Lesbos.
meanings.sent5: In her heart, she carries the essence of a true Lesbos.

meanings.sent1: She came out as a Lesbos last year.
meanings.sent2: The community welcomed her as a proud Lesbos.
meanings.sent3: At the party, she introduced herself as a fun-loving Lesbos.
meanings.sent4: Her love story was as beautiful and unique as any Lesbos.
meanings.sent5: In her eyes, you could see the strength and pride of a true Lesbos.
